name: Collapsing Reality
description:
You’re the universe’s last hope.

Ancient void creatures want to destroy the fabric of reality itself, for the void to reign once again. But with yours Dimensional Stabilizer and your weapon, it’s your job to defend the universe. Just be careful to not waken the sleeping beast.

Tutorial:

The area affected by the Stabilizers decreases when the enemies attack it, or when the turrets arrond shots, you can use your energy bar to restore the Stabilizers by shooting at then.

Avoid the enemies, they can hit you, and do not go to the dark.

Enemies drop energy orbs that the player can pick it up, or if it’s close enough the Stabilisers can pick as well, restoring it’s life.

Placing more Stabilizers consumes half of your energy bar.

Controls:

Use WASD to move. 

Left Mouse button to shoot 

Spacebar to place the Dimensional Stabilizer
